name: Lost in the Clouds
description:
A tomato's adventure in the clouds

This is the first platformer game I made while picking up game design. It took me a week to complete this project. My goal for this project was to keep things simple: implement a working platformer game that is worth 10mins of fun

I had the guidance of a tutorial to figure out how to code a platformer game but I ultimately tweaked the project in my personal vision as far as possible in terms of game feel and level designs

All art and music are free assets I sourced together to fit my theme of an adventure in the clouds. However, I did create the pixel animations for the base character, goal flag and heart (life up)

Did you guys enjoy the game? Did you beat the game? All comments are welcome to help me make better games in the future!
